features: Summer's Eve Blissful Escape daily feminine wipes remove odor
Summer’s Eve daily refreshing feminine wipes are gynecologist tested, free from dyes and parabens, and the product is not tested on animals
Blissful Escape indulgent SafeScent is inspired by fruit, florals and vibrant berries and gentle enough for your most delicate skin

body.description: A refreshing, cleansing experience for your intimate area so you can take on anything. Summer's Eve Refreshing feminine care products comes in a variety of indulgent SafeScents letting you experience that unique, everyday Summer’s Eve readiness. Summer's Eve Feminine wipes is created for your most intimate areas to gently cleanse away the bacteria that can cause odor. Uniquely formulated and pH-balanced to match your body's natural chemistry. All Summer's Eve feminine hygiene products, along with every unique scent, are gynecologist tested to ensure they are safe, even for sensitive skin. Blissful Escape indulgent SafeScent is inspired by fruit, florals and vibrant berries and gentle enough for your most delicate skin . That’s why millions of women trust our expansive range of gynecologist-tested cleansing and care. Our wide variety of products are made for everybody – whether you’re at home or on the go, want to bask in fragrant lusciousness or no scent at all or want ultra-gentle or high performance. With every Summer’s Eve product you use, know that We See You, We Get You, We Got You.

Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Wash Summer's Eve Feminine Cleansing Cloths Summer's Eve Feminine Freshening Spray Summer's Eve Feminine Body Powder Summer's Eve Feminine Night-Time Cleansing Cloths Summer's Eve Feminine Night-Time Cleansing Wash Everyday Cleansing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Night-Time Calming ✓ ✓ During/After My Period ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Before/After Intimacy ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ After Working Out ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Absorbs Moisture and Wetness ✓ ✓ Helps Control Odor ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

Because regular soap and body washes aren't specially formulated for your external vaginal area, and can cause itching, dryness or irritation. Try switching from bar soap or regular body wash to a pH­ balanced feminine wash like Summer's Eve. Remember, feminine itching can be caused by a variety of factors, so always talk to your gynecologist about any itch-related matters. A pH number (0-14) measures how acidic or alkaline something is. For example pure water has a pH of 7, which is neutral. Your skin pH varies depending on the part of the body, and from person to person. Summer's Eve's pH-balanced products are specifically formulated to be in harmony with the natural pH-balance of your feminine area. Because your day is full of reasons you want to feel fresh and clean, there's Summer's Eve. Start your day with Summer's Eve cleansing washes for general daily cleansing. Then, use Summer's Eve cloths, talc-free powder and freshening spray after a workout, before getting intimate, or anytime you'd like to feel fresh and clean. For freshness overnight, try our night-time products with lavender and botanicals. Yes! Both gynecologists and dermatologists give our products the green light for everyday use. Our products are soap free, alcohol free and hypoallergenic. Love fragrance? Great! Our Safe Scents quality standards ensure that the fragrances you love are gentle enough for you most delicate skin. Plus, Summer’s Eve powder is - and has always been talc free. So you can trust Summer’s Eve to help you start fresh and stay fresh every day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love them i recommend them foresure

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 14, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Is great value and easy to use and to keep in my purse

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I've been relying on these wipes for years and this is the best way to buy them. One of these travel packs costs over $5 at the store. I have never seen this scent in stores though. I feel it could be because this scent is strong. It doesn't bother me but might bother someone with a sensitive nose.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2020
reviews.reviewText: They were the perfect size! They’re so easy to use and they smell amazing. Definitely buying more in the future

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Every lady need these
reviews.reviewText: These are so refreshing and I have that little extra that makes me smile when using these....if your having an odor you need to either take a good ole shower or consult a doctor if it’s a problem...these aren’t a substitute for hot water and soap...I’m already a clean person that don’t have any odors so these are just a refresher for me...try them

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 1, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Hello I just got mine today and I really love them I travel a lot and I always try to keep a few with me,

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the convenience
reviews.reviewText: I love the convenience of these. They smell nice and can be easily carried around privately. I'm super sensitive to everything, but have had no issues with these. Love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the go wipe for women.
reviews.reviewText: Its right for the price. Its my favorite scent. Its nice to be able to put some in your purse or travel bag.
